reviewText: We have been without our beloved Santa Fe for almost 20 years now. This video is a very educational glimpse into one of America's greatest Railroads. I highly recomend this or any of Charles videos.

First of all, let me say that the video and audio are first rate! Everything is so clear and crisp, the video might have been shot yesterday. This is divided into chapters (10), and there is a lot of duplication in the various chapters.. Other than the duplication, it's a great DVD in your collection!
